--- layout: component title: Loading animation description: The loading animation component is used to let the user know the system is working and to wait for the result. It can be used at the component level to indicate that something will be updated there, or at the page level when the entire page is being loaded. guidelines: do: - Loading time of 1 second or longer requires a loading animation dont: - Use in place of missing content or data - Leave on the page after content has finished loading contents: - Usage guidelines - Basic loader - Complex loader ---
